UKBB-phenotype-parser¶

This script will take the UKBB phenotype file and convert it into a format that BOLT-LMM can handle.

API¶

Takes the .tab file for UKBB phenotype data and converts it into the space delimited format required by BOLT-LMM :in_path: :out_path: :return: None :example: .. jupyter-execute:

import UKBB-phenotype-parser
pparse.parse_for_BOLT(in_path,out_path)
